overview:
Born in Spain in 1975, Charlie Perez is an adventurer who has travel around the world with a lot of passion in differents fields of human knowledge. Photographer, filmmaker, entrepeneur, with a solid scientific formation on physics, arqueology and antropology, he is currently living in Ecuador, involved on projects with native comunities on the Amazonian rainforest.

He has produced, and directed TV commercials, TV series, and 2 long-feature films aired on HBO. He has worked as a photojournalist for internacional news agencies and as a commercial photographer for media agencies as JWT, Ogilvy, DDB, BBDO, etc.

As an entrepreneur since he was 21, he start his own production company in Spain called INDEPENDENT DOGS.
